subject: Pro x pedals
description_text:
Hiya I just received my pro x pedals about half hour thank you for that but
I've just noticed that there is no vam motors on them and I was under the
impression that it came with them but anyway im looking at your website
about buying some and I didn't expect to pay that much extra as I've just
brought a whole new sim rig set up lol. Anyway my pedals came with a
controller hub and it has 3 motor connections and you sell the vam pro set
3 pack with power supply and without if i have the that hub do I need the
power supply? And it seems that its cheaper to buy them in singles.
 Anyway any chance of a discount code please ?  lol or a special offer
like buy 2 get 3rd free lol im trying to save as much as i can as i need a
new steering wheel

Hope this message finds you well and thank you once again for these pedals
im so looking forward to using them


Mark
Have a nice day

conversations.body_text: Hi Mark Ryan,     Since you're using the ProX pedals, we recommend choosing the VAM motor instead of the VAM Pro. The VAM Pro's bidirectional control is better supported by the ProX Ultra controller, whereas the standard ProX controller has limited compatibility with that feature.  Also, please note that the VAM motor requires a separate 24V 3A power supply. If you don’t already have one, you’ll need to purchase it separately.
